hero.title: Rhodes Network
hero.text: The Rhodes release introduces some minor changes and upgrades to the runtime but more importantly facilitates the launch of an exciting new feature, video NFTs.

releasePlan.title: Release Plan
releasePlan.text: Read the release plan as it was made during the planning stage, and learn more about how the development evolved.

blogPost.title: Announcement Blog Post
blogPost.text: Read a brief primer on the Rhodes testnet and its objectives.

testnetGoals.title: Testnet Goals
testnetGoals.subtitle: The goals listed below are a simplified representation of our main objectives for the Rhodes testnet.

launchingVideoNFTs.title: Launching Video NFTs
launchingVideoNFTs.text: Rhodes facilitates the usage of video NFTs on the runtime side. This allows Atlas to implement features such as minting, buying and selling of video NFTs on the user facing side.

roles.title: Incentivized Roles for the Rhodes Network

map.title: Rhodes
map.text: <0>The city of Rhodes, located northeast of Crete, southeast of Athens, was an ancient Greek city and the associated island group's historical capital.</0> This city has an incredibly rich history and was at times independent but also part of many great historical empires. <1/><1/> Most famously, during the classical era, they were known both for their incredible naval prowess, inspiring the quote: "If we have ten Rhodians, we have ten ships", but also the incredible Colossus of Rhodes, which was one of the seven wonders of the ancient world. <1/><1/><2><0/> Read the blog post</2>
